DOC.brief_summary: The current study proposes study feasibility acceptability Families Preventing Diabetes Together Intervention among 40 family one parent diagnose type 2 diabetes least 1 child age 5-14 year age . Successful recruitment , measurement randomization patient family provide data aim assess feasibility . Patient family participation intervention feedback via post-intervention survey provide data aim acceptability .
DOC.detailed_description: The current study randomize control trial 40 family . Twenty family randomly assign receive usual care consist diabetes education deliver Fairview Health Services . An additional 20 family randomize family-based , in-person program focus nutrition education , development meal plan cook skill promotion healthful eating family ; program augment usual care diabetes education receive Fairview Health Services parent diabetes . Parents diabetes randomized intervention group also participate one goal-setting phone call intervention staff one point intervention program . Adult patient family recruit two way : 1. Fairview Health Service 's clinic North metropolitan area assistance Fairview Health Service diabetes educator , 2. MyChart message inform study . Adults age 25 55 year diagnosis Type 2 diabetes , participate least diabetes education Fairview Health Services , least one child age 7-12 year age invite participate study . Successful recruitment , measurement randomization patient family provide data aim assess feasibility . Patient family participation intervention feedback via post-intervention survey provide data aim acceptability .
